name: Bean Jump
description:
Fullfill your dream of being a jumping blob !

In this game, you're playing as a blob trying to escape the flood, by climbing an endless bean ! Jump left and right, always landing on the leafy side, to escape the accelerating water. What score will you be able to make?

Controls (if the keyboard is not working, click on the game to regain focus) :

Left/right arrowJump left and rightup arrowJump straight
MMute the game

You can also use your mouse and click on the left or right part of the screen (or if you're on mobile)

This is my submission for the lowrezjam 2017 !

Have fun, and don't hesitate to leave feedback and comment :)
